00020     Config::Config()
00021     {
00022         m_isLoaded = false;
00023         m_filename = "se-noname.conf";
00024         m_filepath = "/tmp/";
00025     }

00027     Config::Config(QString filePath, QString filename)
00028     {
00029         m_filename = filename+".conf";
00030         m_filepath = filePath;
00031 
00032         m_isLoaded = load();
00033     }

00036         // NOTHING TO DO

00049     QMap<QString, QString> Config::values() const
00050     {
00051         return m_valueMap;

00054     Config::Config(const Config& config)
00055     {
00056         m_filename = config.filename();
00057         m_valueMap = config.values();
00058     }

00060     bool Config::isLoaded() const
00061     {
00062         return m_isLoaded;
00063     }

00065     bool Config::contains(QString name) const
00066     {
00067         return m_valueMap.contains(name);
00068     }
00069 
00070     void Config::set(QString name, QString value)
00071     {
00072         m_valueMap[name] = value;
00073     }
00074 
00075     QString Config::get(QString name) const
00076     {
00077         if (m_valueMap.contains(name))
00078             return m_valueMap.value(name);
00079         else
00080             return QString();
00081     }
00082 
00083     void Config::save()
00084     {
00085         QDomDocument doc( "SilentEye" );
00086         QDomElement root = doc.createElement("configuration");
00087         doc.appendChild(root);
00088 
00089         QMap<QString, QString>::const_iterator i = m_valueMap.constBegin();
00090         while (i != m_valueMap.constEnd()) {
00091             QDomElement conf = doc.createElement(i.key());
00092             conf.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(i.value()));
00093             root.appendChild(conf);
00094             ++i;
00095         }
00096 
00097         /* open the output file */
00098         QFile file(m_filepath+m_filename);
00099         if( !file.open( QIODevice::WriteOnly ) )
00100         {
00101             qWarning() << "Can't save configuration file to " << m_filepath+m_filename;
00102             return;
00103         }
00104 
00105         /* write data to the output file */
00106         QTextStream ts( &file );
00107         /* Profile serialize datas */
00108         ts << doc.toString();
00109         file.close();
00110     }
00111 
00112     bool Config::load()
00113     {
00114         QDomDocument doc( "SilentEye" );
00115 
00116         QFile file(m_filepath+m_filename);
00117         if(file.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
00118         {
00119             /* load file content to xml document */
00120             if(doc.setContent( &file ) )
00121             {
00122                 file.close();
00123                 QDomElement root = doc.documentElement();
00124 
00125                 QDomNode n = root.firstChild();
00126 
00127                 while(!n.isNull())
00128                 {
00129                     QDomElement e = n.toElement();
00130                     if( !e.isNull() )
00131                     {
00132                         m_valueMap[e.tagName()] = e.text();
00133                     }
00134                     n = n.nextSibling();
00135                 }
00136                 return true;
00137             }
00138             else
00139                 file.close();
00140         }
00141         else
00142             qWarning() << "Can't open configuration file: " << m_filepath+m_filename;
00143 
00144         return false;
00145     }
00146 
00147     Config& Config::operator=(const Config& config)
00148                              {
00149         m_filename = config.filename();
00150         m_filepath = config.filepath();
00151         m_valueMap = config.values();
00152         return *this;
00153     }
